languages.text: "Люди идут за тобой, потому что ты пережил ужасы, что им и не снились. Но если боль делает сильнее — передо мной ты ничто".
"People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."
languages.original_text: "Люди идут за тобой, потому что ты пережил ужасы, что им и не снились. Но если боль делает сильнее — передо мной ты ничто".

traits.locale_text: "People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."
"People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."
"People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."
"People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."
"People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."
"People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."

languages.text: 「人々が君に従っているのは、君が彼らが想像すらできない恐怖を生き延びたからだ。しかし、もし経験した苦痛が人の強さと結び付くのなら、君など{mf|俺|私}に比べれば取るに足らない存在だ」
languages.original_text: "People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."

traits.locale_text: 「人々が君に従っているのは、君が彼らが想像すらできない恐怖を生き延びたからだ。しかし、もし経験した苦痛が人の強さと結び付くのなら、君など{mf|俺|私}に比べれば取るに足らない存在だ」

languages.text: "Die Leute folgen Euch, weil Ihr Schrecken überlebt habt, die sie sich niemals träumen ließen. Aber wenn Schmerz stärker macht, seid Ihr nichts gegen mich."
languages.original_text: "People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."

traits.locale_text: "Die Leute folgen Euch, weil Ihr Schrecken überlebt habt, die sie sich niemals träumen ließen. Aber wenn Schmerz stärker macht, seid Ihr nichts gegen mich."

languages.text: "İnsanlar izinizden gidiyor zira onların hayal bile edemeyeceği dehşetlerden sağ çıktın. Lakin birini güçlü kılan şey kederse o hâlde sen benim yanımda bir hiçsin."
languages.original_text: "People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlar izinizden gidiyor zira onların hayal bile edemeyeceği dehşetlerden sağ çıktın. Lakin birini güçlü kılan şey kederse o hâlde sen benim yanımda bir hiçsin."

languages.text: «La gente le sigue porque ha sobrevivido a horrores con los que ni siquiera soñaban. Pero si es el dolor lo que nos hace fuertes, no puede compararse conmigo».
languages.original_text: "People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."

traits.locale_text: «La gente le sigue porque ha sobrevivido a horrores con los que ni siquiera soñaban. Pero si es el dolor lo que nos hace fuertes, no puede compararse conmigo».

languages.text: “这些人追随你，是因为你从难以想象的恐怖之中活了下来。不过，如果说痛苦可以让人变得坚强，那你和我比起来，恐怕就不值一提了。”
languages.original_text: "People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."

traits.locale_text: “这些人追随你，是因为你从难以想象的恐怖之中活了下来。不过，如果说痛苦可以让人变得坚强，那你和我比起来，恐怕就不值一提了。”

languages.text: « Les gens vous suivent, car vous avez survécu à des horreurs qu'ils sont incapables d'imaginer. Mais si la douleur est vraiment à l'origine de la force, alors vous n'êtes rien face à moi. »
languages.original_text: "People follow you because you have survived horrors they have never dreamt of. But if pain makes a person stronger, then you are nothing compared to me."

traits.locale_text: « Les gens vous suivent, car vous avez survécu à des horreurs qu'ils sont incapables d'imaginer. Mais si la douleur est vraiment à l'origine de la force, alors vous n'êtes rien face à moi. »
